text: (upbeat music)
- My name is Katja.
I am IoT Specialist Solutions architect
at AWS and I'm working out of Munich.

I started studying
computer engineering back

in my bachelors and then went
over to doing my master's

and then I moved over to doing
like a working studentship
and I loved it here so much.
I mean, the people are just amazing.
So I really tried my best and it worked

out actually to start here
as Solutions Architect

which was really nice
because I love the mixture

of technical as well as
using soft skills for a job.
That's why I do IoT is

because the projects
are really, really cool.

But what helps me or what
makes me like really happy
is to see the customer actually

progressing in their journey
and seeing them learn.

And AWS really trusts in
you being a person that can
you know, make their own decisions.
So if I need to go to doctor's appointment

in the middle of the
day, that's totally fine
and I don't even need to ask somebody.
I'm just blocking my own calendar.

You're really in control
of what you're doing.
I don't have my manager come
to me and tell me the task for the week.
I choose the tasks.

You can really make your own
role the way you want it to be.
So it's really up to you.
